title: Max and Ivy Enjoy Magic – Beginner Magic Set with Storybook for Children Ages 3-7 – Learn Disappearing Coin, Pencil Slicer & Dice Tricks with QR Video Instructions – Read & Play Educational Magic Set
features: UNIQUE READ, play and learn CONCEPT: Our innovative approach pairs the captivating storybook "Max and Ivy enjoy Magic" with the same tricks featured in the book! Children follow Max and Ivy as they visit a magic show, learn tricks from Grandma and Grandpa, and perform as "Incredible Ivy" and "Magic Max." Then they can perform these exact same tricks themselves, just like their favorite characters!

BEGINNER-FRIENDLY MAGIC SET: Designed specifically for young magicians just starting out, this durable, safe and quality magic set includes the disappearing coin trick, pencil slicer trickand rattling dice illusion from the story, with all necessary props and simple instructions. As Grandma says, "Practice always makes perfect!" Children will feel successful from their very first "Abracadabra!" building confidence through magical moments.

EVERYTHING INCLUDED: This comprehensive magic set comes with all the specially designed props needed to perform amazing illusions: a magic wand, disappearing coin box, rattling dice, and the pencil slicer trick – just like in the book! Each prop is made with child-safe, premium materials sized perfectly for small hands, with QR code video tutorials for extra help.

BUILDS CONFIDENCE & SKILLS: Watch your child's face light up as they master each trick and perform for family and friends! As Daddy says in the book, "You can make anyone smile with a bit of magic." Beyond entertainment, this magic set develops critical skills including fine motor control, memory, sequence following, and performance confidence while enhancing literacy through storytelling.

THE PERFECT GIFT: Searching for a unique present that will truly delight? This premium magic set lets children recreate the joy and wonder from the "Max and Ivy enjoy Magic" story! Parents appreciate the educational value and quality materials while children love becoming real magicians like Max and Ivy – creating their own magic show that amazes everyone!
